about_the_game: Get access to an alternative version of the starting Sword & Shield named Trailblazer's Arms! It features a shield in unique blue and silver colors, and an engraved version of the starting sword.

content_descriptors.notes: Ravenbound depicts high levels of violence between humanoids with large amounts of blood and some environmental gore such as dead bodies and bloodied props.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bit OS - Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-6400 (4C / 4T) (Q3 ‘15), AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 4GB, AMD Radeon RX 5500 XT 4GB or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64 bit OS - Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770, AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 8 GB, AMD Vega 56 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

short_description: Get the Trailblazer's Arms DLC and enjoy a beautifully decorated sword and shield for your Vessel fighting monsters in the lands of Ávalt!
